name: js-events-app
description: Events calendar app (Node.js, Nest.js, React.js, Next.js, Redux.js)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix backend" "npm run build --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
